appDescription.message: Block anyone with specific keywords in their Twitter bio.

blockedWords.message: List of bio words that will activate blocking, separate by comma:

confirmBlock.message: Ask me to confirm before blocking

intro.message:
Hey you, welcome! 👋

Thanks for installing this extension. It blocks people who use specific keywords in their Twitter bio. You can specify which words should result in blocking by entering them below.

blockCount.message: This extension has blocked {N} douches for you.
